generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending across the frame, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the road, with pedestrians and bicycles on it.
- building: A large brick building with multiple windows and arched doorways is prominently featured on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Several trees are visible in the background and along the sides of the road, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: There are multiple people visible in the image, including individuals standing near parked cars and one person riding a bicycle.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the right side of the image, which qualifies as a rider.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road and some are visible in the distance.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign is visible on a pole near the center of the image.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible in the image, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
